US VP Harris calls for immediate ceasefire to ease "humanitarian catastrophe" in GazaKamala Harris pressed Israel to increase the flow of aid to ease what she called "inhumane" conditions and a "humanitarian catastrophe" among the Palestinian people. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 21:15:10 GMT IH5VXTUGPNP2BB3G3KYVCAYOYE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-vp-harris-urges-israeli-government-to-do-more-boost-aid-into-gaza-2024-03-03/Jeff Mason世界
Galapagos volcano starts to erupt on uninhabited islandEcuador's La Cumbre volcano, part of the Galapagos archipelago, has started to erupt, the government of the South American country reported on Sunday. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 20:26:32 GMT YPC2UIOZ5FPXZD6P6DMWKK4USQ https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/galapagos-volcano-starts-erupting-uninhabited-island-2024-03-03/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
Ukraine's Zelenskiy: Political will in West required to secure needed suppliesPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy on Sunday called for Ukraine's Western partners to summon the political will to provide Kyiv with necessary military supplies or the world will face "one of the most shameful pages of history." Sun, 03 Mar 2024 20:13:24 GMT UH5ZMCMP5BN7XDBJSFQPJJUXCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-zelenskiy-political-will-required-secure-needed-supplies-2024-03-03/Reuters世界欧洲
Indian police detain three accused of raping Brazilian-Spanish touristIndian police have detained three men and are searching for four others accused of attacking two tourists and gang-raping the woman, authorities and the couple said. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 19:33:49 GMT M3HQSRTQLZMS5H7BB7PNZUHPMQ https://www.reuters.com/world/india/indian-police-detain- Three-accused-raping-brazilian-spanish-tourist-2024-03-03/Reuters世界印度
France's far-right RN makes immigration pillar of Europe poll campaignThe French far-right Rassemblement National (RN) of Marine Le Pen kicked off the party's campaign for the European elections in June on Sunday saying the vote will be a referendum on immigration. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 17:52:00 GMT NHZQUE53GVLF7PVYNDYKMOBQBI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/france-far-right-rn-makes-immigration-pillar-europe-poll-campaign-2024-03-03/Reuters世界欧洲
US envoy due in Beirut to continue de-escalation talksU.S. envoy Amos Hochstein will visit Beirut on Monday to continue diplomatic efforts aimed at de-escalating the conflict across the Lebanese-Israeli border and bringing stability, a senior Lebanese official and a White House official said on Sunday. Sun, 03 Mar 2024 17:25:23 GMT 3B6L4OUBQFLHNIJ2P4A4EAEHAE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-envoys-dove-beirut-continues-escalation-talks-2024-03-03/Reuters世界中东地区
Germany accuses Russia of "information war" after military recordingGermany's defence minister said on Sunday Russia was conducting an "information war" aimed at creating divisions within Germany, his first reaction to the publication in Russia of an audio recording of a meeting of senior German military officials. Iran's president discusses Gaza with Algerian counterpart, Algeria's presidency saysIran's President Ebrahim Raisi on Sunday discussed bilateral relations, energy cooperation, trade and Gaza with Algeria's leader Abdelmadjid Tebboune in a one-day state visit, according to Algeria's presidency. Israeli students head back to school in town ravaged by HamasCheerful music welcomed children apprehensively returning to school amid heavy security on Sunday in Sderot, one of the Israeli towns near the Gaza border attacked by Hamas on Oct. 7. French farmers could stage more protests, union boss saysFrench farmers could stage more protests and blockades in the coming weeks to push the government to deliver on its promises to help the sector, the head of France's largest farming union FNSEA said on Sunday. Malaysia says MH370 search must go on, 10 years after plane vanishedMalaysia is pushing for a renewed search for Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370, the transport minister said on Sunday, as the 10th anniversary of its disappearance in one of the world's greatest aviation mysteries approaches.
